ðŸ“– Summary: Chatbox is a user-friendly desktop client application designed to interact with various AI models and Large Language Models (LLMs) such as GPT, Claude, Gemini, and Ollama. It provides a unified interface for accessing and utilizing these AI models on Windows, macOS, and Linux, offering a convenient way to engage with AI technology.
